attributes.action: Termination of DVLA Enforcement Contractor's Contract
attributes.additional_details: That the government terminate the contract of the present DVLA Enforcement Contractor with immediate effect and without compensation on account of the contractor's repeated clamping and seizure of motor vehicles in contravention of the applicable legislation and statutory instruments and that enforcement be returned to and carried out by Crown Servants employed directly by DVLA through the Civil Service Commission and not by private sector contractors.
